column4: I'm planning on Dual booting Dapper with an existing Hoary install... is there anything I should do before I just install dapper from a CD????
any dual boot fiends in here?
i want to dual boot hoary and dapper.
dapper is the new Ubuntu (in development). The one after Hoary.
- so have you dual booted with difft distros ? I've only done it with difft OS's
and the entries in gurb for the two kernels should be really similar
im not sure, i've never installed ubuntu without a bootloader
